name: Infestation (itch) (ShaneFitzpatrick)
description:
Infestation is a 3D adventure game made by me in an attempt to try something new, the game isn't finished yet but i have several things planned for when i do come back onto this game. 

You find yourself lost in the forest only to be greeted by the fairy who lost her sister, seeing as you woke up with weaponry you decide to help her out only to find out the island has been infested with spiders. You are tasked in finding out why the outbreak of spiders have taken place whilst also finding what happened to her sister. Is she still alive? there's only one way to find out.

What i have learnt from making this 3D game most of all is the character interaction. Having a question mark above their heads and pressing E to change to the next dialog was an impressive feat that i achieved.
